name: Pro Wildlife
membership:
Species Survival Network www.ssn.org
Deutscher Naturschutzring www.dnr.de
goal: Pro Wildlife is committed to the protection of wild animals and their habitat
interests: Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
EU policy on global wildlife trade issues and implementation of decisions by the Convention on International Trade in Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) in the EU
preventing unsustainable and illegal wildlife trade for the EU market
EU Wildlife trade regulation 338/97
implementation of the EU Action Plan against wildlife trafficking
biodiversity policies
EU policy at International Whaling Commission
